turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The location that's on Germantown Avenue in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania in the Chestnut Hill section of the city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on germantown avenue, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your order will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you. can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.
